remixlab.dandelion.constraint

Class EyeConstraint

  • java.lang.Object
    • remixlab.dandelion.constraint.Constraint
      • remixlab.dandelion.constraint.AxisPlaneConstraint
        • remixlab.dandelion.constraint.EyeConstraint

  • public class EyeConstraint
extends AxisPlaneConstraint
    An AxisPlaneConstraint defined in the Eye coordinate system.

    The AxisPlaneConstraint.translationConstraintDirection() and AxisPlaneConstraint.rotationConstraintDirection() are expressed in the associated eye() coordinate system.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class remixlab.dandelion.constraint.AxisPlaneConstraint

        AxisPlaneConstraint.Type

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      EyeConstraint(Eye theEye)
      Creates an EyeConstraint, whose constrained directions are defined in the eye() coordinate system.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Rotation constrainRotation(Rotation rotation, Frame frame)
      When AxisPlaneConstraint.rotationConstraintType() is of type AXIS, constrain rotation to be a rotation around an axis whose direction is defined in the eye() coordinate system by AxisPlaneConstraint.rotationConstraintDirection().
      Vec constrainTranslation(Vec translation, Frame frame)
      Depending on AxisPlaneConstraint.translationConstraintType(), constrain translation to be along an axis or limited to a plane defined in the eye() coordinate system by AxisPlaneConstraint.translationConstraintDirection().
      Eye eye()
      Returns the associated Eye.

      • Methods inherited from class remixlab.dandelion.constraint.AxisPlaneConstraint

        rotationConstraintDirection, rotationConstraintType, setRotationConstraint, setRotationConstraintDirection, setRotationConstraintType, setTranslationConstraint, setTranslationConstraintDirection, setTranslationConstraintType, translationConstraintDirection, translationConstraintType

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait
